pr_title: Feature #33031 Partner and Orders : shipping cost management and free shipping cost amount of the order is above a certain amount

timeline.message:
Partner and Orders : shipping cost management and free shipping cost if amount of the order is above a certain amount

-New field for Shipment mode to choose wether or not free shipping can be applied

-New object Customer Shipping Carriage Paid to override by customer the amount needed to access free shipping

-If a shipment mode with free shipping option is selected for an order, an order line appears with the shipping cost if the amount is below free shipping threshold

-Shipment mode can no longer be changed when the quotation is validated
